parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: The ID of the application that you want to query.

parameters.name: OrganizationalUnitIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the organizations that are allowed to access the application. You can query a maximum of 100 organization IDs at a time.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.
